price: If at the time of distribution, [other] relatives, orphans, and the needy are present, give them something too[7], and speak to them kindly.
arabic: وَإِذَا حَضَرَ ٱلۡقِسۡمَةَ أُوْلُواْ ٱلۡقُرۡبَىٰ وَٱلۡيَتَٰمَىٰ وَٱلۡمَسَٰكِينُ فَٱرۡزُقُوهُم مِّنۡهُ وَقُولُواْ لَهُمۡ قَوۡلٗا مَّعۡرُوفٗا
footnotes: [7] Those who have no share in the inheritance.
